channel.title: Hey there, I'm Kinman and currently bootstrapping bastions.co
channel.description:
Hey bootstrapped community! My name is Kinman and I'm working towards bootstrapping my first product. I've always dreamed of being an entrepreneur. I used to have a nice business in middle school selling sodas for twice what I was paying, until I got shut down by the school with a nasty talking-to and a district-wide memo. So I settled for a career in software development, where I currently reside, which has been a blast.
Needless to say, I'm excited to join the community and look forward to learning from you guys.

item.title: Hey there, I'm Kinman and currently bootstrapping bastions.co
item.dc:creator: Skiltz
item.description:
I had a similar idea but decided not to pursue it. Welcome and good luck!

http://matthewskilton.me/validation-monitoring-contact-us-forms-to-ensure-uptime/

Read full topic
